name: Candy Platformer (Trex9876)
description:
You know how they say learn more from making mistakes than succeeding? Well this game is full of learned lessons for me.

Probably the worst game I've ever made. I learned so much of how not do do stuff that I'll probably take another attempt at it at some point so I can do this game right.

Controller HIGHLY recommended. 

Double jump (among other things) is kind of broken but the game is completable.
